trans-unit.source: Use the SDK to enable apps for MAM | Microsoft Intune
trans-unit.target: Use the SDK to enable apps for MAM | Microsoft Intune

trans-unit.source: Use the SDK to enable apps for mobile application management
trans-unit.target: Use the SDK to enable apps for mobile application management

trans-unit.source: Use the Microsoft Intune App SDK to enable Intune to manage certain features of your iOS or Android mobile apps.
trans-unit.target: Use the Microsoft Intune App SDK to enable Intune to manage certain features of your iOS or Android mobile apps.

trans-unit.source: After your app is enabled, you can deploy policies to the app.
trans-unit.target: After your app is enabled, you can deploy policies to the app.

trans-unit.source: These policies use those features to protect your corporate data.
trans-unit.target: These policies use those features to protect your corporate data.

trans-unit.source: Examples of the types of protections that you can implement with the SDK are:
trans-unit.target: Examples of the types of protections that you can implement with the SDK are:

trans-unit.source: Prevent users from copying corporate documents to the cloud
trans-unit.target: Prevent users from copying corporate documents to the cloud

trans-unit.source: Require encryption of data that is saved to the device by the app.
trans-unit.target: Require encryption of data that is saved to the device by the app.

trans-unit.source: Enforce the use of a managed browser
trans-unit.target: Enforce the use of a managed browser

trans-unit.source: Remotely wipe corporate data from the app
trans-unit.target: Remotely wipe corporate data from the app

trans-unit.source: You need access to the app's source code to use the SDK, but you can enable most of the SDK features without having to change the app's behavior.
trans-unit.target: You need access to the app's source code to use the SDK, but you can enable most of the SDK features without having to change the app's behavior.

trans-unit.source: For an overview of the SDK, see the [Overview](/intune/develop/intune-app-sdk) page.
trans-unit.target: For an overview of the SDK, see the [Overview](/intune/develop/intune-app-sdk) page.

trans-unit.source: To start using the Intune App SDK, see [Getting Started With the Microsoft Intune App SDK](/intune/develop/intune-app-sdk-get-started).
trans-unit.target: To start using the Intune App SDK, see [Getting Started With the Microsoft Intune App SDK](/intune/develop/intune-app-sdk-get-started).

trans-unit.source: Decide how to prepare apps for mobile application management with Microsoft Intune
trans-unit.target: Decide how to prepare apps for mobile application management with Microsoft Intune
